Aqicards.subtitle: PM2.5, PM10–2.5, PM10, O3, SO2
Aqicards.description: A growing body of evidence links chronic exposure to air pollution especially particulate matter (PM) with mortality resulting from a variety of heart, lung, and even liver

Aqicards.subtitle: asthma, cardiovascular, infants
Aqicards.description: People’s health risk from air pollution varies widely depending on age, where they live, their underlying health, and other factors of changes

Aqicards.subtitle: Air Quality Index
Aqicards.description: Think of the AQI as a yardstick that runs from 0 to 500. The higher the AQI value,the greater the risks of previous mentioned diseases.They are rampand everywhere one travels

Header.title: Air Quality at IBA
Header.paragraph: Monitoring realtime air quality (AQI) at IBA

About.paragraph: Smart AQI The Best air monitoring system used to detect air quality. We have come up with most accurate and reliable quality of air any time you want.Utilizing the wide detecting scope, fast responsiveness, high sensitivity, stability of the sensors,Smart AQI depicts the air quality at aparticular area

Services.name: Air Monitoring
Services.text: We monitor air quality of a particular area in realtime taht is reliable and accurate

Services.name: Air Reporting
Services.text: The reporting of monitored air can also be depicted that provides further information about the air quality

Services.name: Notifications
Services.text: Smart AQI also notifies the user of higly polluted air to take precautions.If AQI > 300,move to a save place

Services.name: Downloading
Services.text: We provide downloading of the air result report in csv format

Services.name: AQI NewsLetter and Articles
Services.text: We provide articles about the world AQI

Services.name: Smart AQI Products
Services.text: We provide AQI products that provides fresh and healthy air at home or business
